description:
In game motel creator added
Shell and ipl rooms are now available
Check-in is now available
Personal stashes option is now available
Raid is now available
Stash and gardrobe limits are removed. Can be added unlimited
The rooms of shell and ipl motels can be added up to a maximum of 500 rooms (Each of motel)
qs-inventory is now working with motel
+500 ipl rooms added. 
 NOTES

If you have previous versions, know that players' stash data will be reset with this update. So make sure that players get their items from the stash before you do this update
Targets are TEMPORARILY disabled. It will be reactivated as soon as possible
